entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • csc.exe hangs on specific file #73789
  • IDE0100 (Remove unnecessary equality operator) catches `x == false` as redundant #73787
  • Adding documents to a VisualStudioWorkspace in a subfolder fails if folder doesn't exist #73783
    Backlog

Closed

  • Version conflict detected for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp #73782
  • Visual Studio 2022 adds a duplicate "Option Strict On" to Code File When Pasting VB.NET Code #73771
  • Collection expression conversion failure should result in element-wise diagnostics #73297
  • Programación #73767
  • Change Workspace.Option setter to throw NotSupportedException #73778
    17.12
  • All analyzers from assembly Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CodeStyle.Fixes failed to load: Unable to load one or more of the requested types. Method not found: 'Boolean Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IParameterSymbol.get_IsParamsArray()'. #73508
    17.11 P3
  • Regression: static initializer not run on class (worked with the old .NET Framework compiler) #73759
  • Remove Lazy Handler requirement from Roslyn LSP #63555
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce Linq usage in SymbolDisplayVisitor.CreateAliasMap #73793
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Address a few locations also need to care about partial properties #73792
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Copy the ITelemetryReporter to a local before using #73790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix exponential blowup parsing pathological files #73788
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Perform nav bar computation in two passes #73786
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename SG run mode from Balanced to Manual #73784
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Expose 5 more things to Razor cohosting #73781

Merged

  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add the LanguageServer folder to CODEOWNERS #73791
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix race causing workspace diagnostics to be stale #73653
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: report specific conversion errors from overload resolution #73307
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Restore RazorCompiler EA layer for desktop #73697
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve AddImport conflict detection performance #73780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid lambda allocation #73785
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move LanguageServer out of Features directory #73779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue where FAR results were not getting sent until they were fully complete #73777
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement alg that determines which projects need to be restarted/rebuilt due to rude edits #73598
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Update partial properties feature branch from main #73774
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify (Large/Source)Text.ParseLineStart to specify an initial capacity for line count #73701
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use a more sensible MEF export for brace completion #73756
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't implicitly load assemblies via MEF in Roslyn language server #73566
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Prepare partial properties feature for merge #73773
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2463692 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Always use a by-value temp to capture a reference type receiver #73631
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle nullability differences in duplicate interfaces #73730
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove poison attributes #73751
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Require AddExplicitInterfaceImplementation for adding a type that implements member explicitly #73206
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Report diagnostic for `field` and `value` identifiers in property accessors where the meaning would change as contextual keywords #73570
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
